languages.text:
Whenever the psyber-raven {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}relays{/g} one of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g}'s non-attacking {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g}, it gains +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} and +{uip|AGI|34b85b2841514256aac25560b25da4cc} Agility for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Stacks.
If the psyber-raven's Willpower is 80 or more at the end of the Overseer's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, it immediately heals to full. If it is already at full {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}, it grants +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} to each ally in a 4-cell radius.

languages.original_text:
{g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}Ретранслируя{/g} неатакующую {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}психосилу{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}надзирателя{/g}, псайберворон получает +5 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воле{/g} и +{uip|AGI|34b85b2841514256aac25560b25da4cc} к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Ловкости{/g} на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}. Суммируется.
Если на конец {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} надзирателя Воля псайберворона равна или больше 80, псайберворон полностью восстанавливает свое {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровье{/g}. Если его запас здоровья уже полон, он на 1 увеличивает {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}решимость{/g} каждого союзника в 4 клетках от себя.

languages.text:
Ruhsiber kuzgun, {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Gözetmen{/g}'in saldırı dışı {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}ruhsezi güçlerinden{/g} birini {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}aktardığında{/g} +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}İrade{/g} ve {uip|AGI|34b85b2841514256aac25560b25da4cc} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Çeviklik{/g} niteliği kazanır. Bu etki 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}raunt{/g} sürer. Etki üst üste birikebilir.
Gözetmen'in {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turunun{/g} sonunda ruhsiber kuzgunun İrade niteliği 80 veya üstündeyse ruhsiber kuzgun anında iyileşerek tam sağlığa ulaşır. {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Sağlığı{/g} zaten tamsa 4 hücrelik yarıçap içindeki tüm dost birimlerine +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}kararlılık{/g} kazandırır.

Whenever the psyber-raven {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}relays{/g} one of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g}'s non-attacking {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g}, it gains +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} and +{uip|AGI|34b85b2841514256aac25560b25da4cc} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Ruhsiber kuzgun, {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Gözetmen'in{/g} saldırı dışı {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}ruhsezi güçlerinden{/g} birini {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}aktardığında{/g} +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}İrade{/g} ve {uip|AGI|34b85b2841514256aac25560b25da4cc} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Çeviklik{/g} niteliği kazanır. Bu etki 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}raunt{/g} sürer. Etki üst üste birikebilir.
Gözetmen'in {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turunun{/g} sonunda ruhsiber kuzgunun İrade niteliği 80 veya üstündeyse ruhsiber kuzgun anında iyileşerek tam sağlığa ulaşır. {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Sağlığı{/g} zaten tamsa 4 hücrelik yarıçap içindeki tüm dost birimlerine +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}kararlılık{/g} kazandırır.

Ruhsiber kuzgun, {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Gözetmen{/g}'in saldırı dışı {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}ruhsezi güçlerinden{/g} birini {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}aktardığında{/g} +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}İrade{/g} kazanır. Bu etki 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}raunt{/g} sürer. Etki üst üste birikebilir.
Gözetmen'in {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turunun{/g} sonunda ruhsiber kuzgunun İrade niteliği 80 veya üstündeyse ruhsiber kuzgun anında iyileşerek tam sağlığa ulaşır. {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Sağlığı{/g} zaten tamsa 4 hücrelik yarıçap içindeki tüm dost birimlerine +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}kararlılık{/g} kazandırır.

languages.text:
Cada vez que el psicocuervo {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}transmite{/g} uno de los {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}poderes psíquicos{/g} no ofensivos del {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}supervisor{/g}, gana +5 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g} y +{uip|AGI|34b85b2841514256aac25560b25da4cc} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilidad{/g} durante 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}. Este efecto es acumulativo.
Si la Voluntad del psicocuervo es de 80 o más al final del {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} del supervisor, recupera todas sus heridas inmediatamente. Si ya tenía las {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} al máximo, otorga +1 de {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}firmeza{/g} a todos los aliados que haya en un radio de 4 casillas.

languages.text:
每当生化渡鸦{g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}中继{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}监察官{/g}的非攻击类{g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}灵能能力{/g}时，{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}提高5点，{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}提高{uip|AGI|34b85b2841514256aac25560b25da4cc}点，持续一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。此效果可叠加。
监察官的{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}结束时，如果生化渡鸦的意志不低于80点，则恢复全部{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}。如果生化渡鸦的生命值已满，则距离4格以内的所有盟友都会获得+1{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}决心{/g}。
languages.original_text:
Whenever the psyber-raven {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}relays{/g} one of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g}'s non-attacking {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g}, it gains +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} and +{uip|AGI|34b85b2841514256aac25560b25da4cc} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Stacks.
If the psyber-raven's Willpower is 80 or more at the end of the Overseer's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, it immediately heals to full. If it is already at full {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}, it grants +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} to each ally in a 4-cell radius.

traits.locale_text:
每当生化渡鸦{g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}中继{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}监察官{/g}的非攻击类{g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}灵能能力{/g}时，{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}提高5点，{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}提高{uip|AGI|34b85b2841514256aac25560b25da4cc}点，持续一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。此效果可叠加。
监察官的{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}结束时，如果生化渡鸦的意志不低于80点，则恢复全部{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}。如果生化渡鸦的生命值已满，则距离4格以内的所有盟友都会获得+1{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}决心{/g}。

每当生化渡鸦{g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}中继{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}监察官{/g}的非攻击型{g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}灵能能力{/g}时，{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}都会提高5点，持续一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。此效果可叠加。
监察官的{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}结束时，如果生化渡鸦的意志不低于80点，则恢复全部{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}。如果生化渡鸦的生命值已满，则距离4格以内的所有盟友都会获得+1{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}决心{/g}。

languages.text:
Wenn der Psitech-Rabe eine der nicht-offensiven {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psionischen Kräfte{/g} des {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Aufsehers{/g} {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}umlenkt{/g}, erhält er 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} lang +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g} und +{uip|AGI|34b85b2841514256aac25560b25da4cc} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Beweglichkeit{/g}. Stapelbar.
Hat der Psitech-Rabe am Ende des {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zuges{/g} des Aufsehers 80 oder mehr Willenskraft, regeneriert er sofort seine gesamte Gesundheit. Sind seine {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} bereits vollständig regeneriert, gewährt er allen Verbündeten in einem Radius von 4 Feldern +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}Entschlossenheit{/g}.
languages.original_text:
Whenever the psyber-raven {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}relays{/g} one of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g}'s non-attacking {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g}, it gains +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} and +{uip|AGI|34b85b2841514256aac25560b25da4cc} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Stacks.
If the psyber-raven's Willpower is 80 or more at the end of the Overseer's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, it immediately heals to full. If it is already at full {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}, it grants +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} to each ally in a 4-cell radius.

traits.locale_text:
Wenn der Psitech-Rabe eine der nicht-offensiven {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psionischen Kräfte{/g} des {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Aufsehers{/g} {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}umlenkt{/g}, erhält er 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} lang +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g} und +{uip|AGI|34b85b2841514256aac25560b25da4cc} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Beweglichkeit{/g}. Stapelbar.
Hat der Psitech-Rabe am Ende des {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zuges{/g} des Aufsehers 80 oder mehr Willenskraft, regeneriert er sofort seine gesamte Gesundheit. Sind seine {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} bereits vollständig regeneriert, gewährt er allen Verbündeten in einem Radius von 4 Feldern +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}Entschlossenheit{/g}.

Wenn der Psitech-Rabe eine der {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psionischen Kräfte{/g} des {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Aufsehers{/g} {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}überträgt{/g}, die keinen Angriff darstellt, erhält er 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} lang +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g}. Stapelbar.
Wenn die Willenskraft des Psitech-Raben am Ende des {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zuges{/g} des Aufsehers 80 oder mehr beträgt, wird er sofort vollständig geheilt. Hat er bereits maximale {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g}, gewährt er allen Verbündeten in einem Radius von 4 Feldern +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}Entschlossenheit{/g}.

languages.text:
Chaque fois que la psyber-corneille {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}relaie{/g} un {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}pouvoir psychique{/g} non offensif du {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}surveillant{/g}, elle gagne +5 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Force mentale{/g} et +{uip|AGI|34b85b2841514256aac25560b25da4cc} d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilité{/g} pendant 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Cumulable.
Si la Force mentale de la psyber-corneille est d'au moins 80 à la fin du tour du {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}surveillant{/g}, elle soigne immédiatement toutes ses blessures. Si ses {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} sont déjà au maximum, elle octroie +1 de {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}Détermination{/g} à tous les alliés dans un rayon de 4 cases.

Stacks.
If the psyber-raven's Willpower is 80 or more at the end of the Overseer's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, it immediately heals to full. If it is already at full {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}, it grants +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} to each ally in a 4-cell radius.

Cumulable.
Si la Force mentale de la psyber-corneille est d'au moins 80 à la fin du tour du {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}surveillant{/g}, elle soigne immédiatement toutes ses blessures. Si ses {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} sont déjà au maximum, elle octroie +1 de {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}Détermination{/g} à tous les alliés dans un rayon de 4 cases.

Chaque fois que la psyber-corneille {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}relaie{/g} un {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}pouvoir psychique{/g} offensif du {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}surveillant{/g}, il gagne +5 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Force mentale{/g} pendant 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Cumulable.
Si la Force mentale de la psyber-corneille est d'au moins 80 à la fin du {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} du surveillant, elle soigne immédiatement toutes ses {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g}. Si ses blessures sont déjà au maximum, elle octroie +1 de {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}Détermination{/g} à tous les alliés dans un rayon de 4 cases.

languages.text:
サイバーレイヴンが{g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}監督官{/g}の非攻撃{g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}超能力{/g}の一つを{g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}中継する{/g}場合、1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志力{/g}が+5、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷性{/g}が+{uip|AGI|34b85b2841514256aac25560b25da4cc}される。この効果はスタックする。
監督官の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}終了時、サイバーレイヴンの意志力が80以上の場合、即座に満タンまで回復する。すでに{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}傷{/g}が全快している場合、半径4セルの味方につき{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}決断力{/g}が+1される。
languages.original_text:
Whenever the psyber-raven {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}relays{/g} one of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g}'s non-attacking {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g}, it gains +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} and +{uip|AGI|34b85b2841514256aac25560b25da4cc} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Stacks.
If the psyber-raven's Willpower is 80 or more at the end of the Overseer's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, it immediately heals to full. If it is already at full {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}, it grants +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} to each ally in a 4-cell radius.

traits.locale_text:
サイバーレイヴンが{g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}監督官{/g}の非攻撃{g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}超能力{/g}の一つを{g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}中継する{/g}場合、1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志力{/g}が+5、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷性{/g}が+{uip|AGI|34b85b2841514256aac25560b25da4cc}される。この効果はスタックする。
監督官の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}終了時、サイバーレイヴンの意志力が80以上の場合、即座に満タンまで回復する。すでに{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}傷{/g}が全快している場合、半径4セルの味方につき{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}決断力{/g}が+1される。

サイバーレイヴンが監督者の非攻撃超能力の一つを{g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}引き継ぐ{/g}場合、1ラウンドの間意志力が+5される。この効果はスタックする。
監督者のターン終了時、サイバーレイヴンの意志力が80以上の場合、即座に満タンまで回復する。すでに傷が全快している場合、半径4セルの味方につき決断力が+1される。

サイバーレイヴンが監督者の非攻撃超能力の一つを{g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}引き継ぐ{/g}場合、1ラウンドの間意志力が+5される。この効果はスタックする。
監督者のターン終了時、サイバーレイヴンの意志力が80以上の場合、即座に満タンまで回復する。すでに傷が全快している場合、半径4セルの味方につき決断力が+1される。

languages.text:
{g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}Ретранслируя{/g} неатакующую {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}психосилу{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}надзирателя{/g}, псайберворон получает +5 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воле{/g} и +{uip|AGI|34b85b2841514256aac25560b25da4cc} к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Ловкости{/g} на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}. Суммируется.
Если на конец {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} надзирателя Воля псайберворона равна или больше 80, псайберворон полностью восстанавливает свое {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровье{/g}. Если его запас здоровья уже полон, он на 1 увеличивает {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}решимость{/g} каждого союзника в 4 клетках от себя.
languages.original_text:
Whenever the psyber-raven {g|f:fcf1f3b77e3e4cf7ba2cb960e2e6028e}relays{/g} one of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g}'s non-attacking {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g}, it gains +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} and +{uip|AGI|34b85b2841514256aac25560b25da4cc} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Stacks.
If the psyber-raven's Willpower is 80 or more at the end of the Overseer's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, it immediately heals to full. If it is already at full {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}, it grants +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} to each ally in a 4-cell radius.
